entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
